pageUpDownKeysDescription.value: Use the Page Up and Page Down keys to move in larger steps.

homeEndKeysDescription.value: Use the Home and End keys to move to the beginning or end.

tabKeyDescription.value: Tab key moves to the next item.

shiftKeyDescription.value: Hold down Shift and press an arrow key to move in smaller steps.

shiftTabKeyDescription.value: Shift plus Tab moves to the previous item.

escapeKeyDescription.value: Escape key exits a dialog, like this one.
